importing and exporting

in this file are dist and src directories. they contain multiple .js files, please refer to them as they have the import and export code in them.

using webpack: CLI commands

  1. npm init
  2. npm i webpack-cli --save-dev
  3. npx webpack
  4. running that should create the main.js file

Remember:

  • ** That if you install jquery or bootstrap CLI is npm i jquery --save-dev or npm i bootstrap --save-dev
  • also anytime you make a change to the javascript you need to run a command from command prompt "npx webpack"
